name: 6_GROUPS_2_TILES
description: Six groups each containing at least 2 tiles of the same type (not necessarily in the depicted shape). The tiles of one group can be different from those of another group.

name: DIAGONAL
description: Five tiles of the same type forming a diagonal.

name: 4_GROUPS_4_TILES
description: Four groups each containing at least 4 tiles of the same type (not necessarily in the depicted shape). The tiles of one group can be different from those of another group.

name: 4_ROWS_3_COLOR
description: Four lines each formed by 5 tiles of maximum three different types. One line can show the same or a different combination of another line.

name: CORNERS
description: Four tiles of the same type in the four corners of the bookshelf.

name: 2_COLUMNS_COLOURFUL
description: Two columns each formed by 6 different types of tiles.

name: SQUARE
description: Two groups each containing 4 tiles of the same type in a 2x2 square. The tiles of one square can be different from those of the other square.

name: 2_ROWS_COLOURFUL
description: Two lines each formed by 5 different types of tiles. One line can show the same or a different combination of the other line.

name: 3_COLUMNS_3_COLOR
description: Three columns each formed by 6 tiles of maximum three different types. One column can show the same or a different combination of another column.

name: X
description: Five tiles of the same type forming an X.

name: 8_SAME
description: Eight tiles of the same type. Thereâ€™s no restriction about the position of these tiles.

name: STAIRS
description: Five columns of increasing or decreasing height. Starting from the first column on the left or on the right, each next column must be made of exactly one more tile. Tiles can be of any type.

name: 6_ADJACENT
description: You will get 8 points for each group containing 6+ adjacent tiles

name: 5_ADJACENT
description: You will get 5 points for each group containing 5 adjacent tiles

name: 4_ADJACENT
description: You will get 3 points for each group containing 4 adjacent tiles

name: 3_ADJACENT
description: You will get 2 points for each group containing 3 adjacent tiles

name: Personal_Goals
description: You need to arrange tiles in a specific pattern. Place a PLANT tile in the 0th col, 5th row, a FRAME tile in the 2nd col, 5th row, a CAT tile in the 4th col, 4th row, a BOOK tile in the 3rd col, 3rd row, a GAME tile in the 1st col, 2nd row, and a TROPHY tile in the 0th col, 2nd row. You will get 1, 2, 4, 6, 9, 12 points for 1, 2, 3, 4 ,5 ,6 tiles in the right position.

name: Personal_Goals2
description: You need to arrange tiles in a specific pattern. Place a PLANT tile in the 1st col, 4th row, a FRAME tile in the 4th col, 0th row, a CAT tile in the 0th col, 3rd row, a BOOK tile in the 4th col, 2nd row, a GAME tile in the 2nd col, 3rd row, and a TROPHY tile in the 3rd col, 1st row. You will get 1, 2, 4, 6, 9, 12 points for 1, 2, 3, 4 ,5 ,6 tiles in the right position.
